text: The Woman at Midnight (Portuguese: La Mujer de medianoche) is a 1925 Brazilian mystery film drama directed by Carlo Campogalliani. The film premiered in Rio de Janeiro on 7 September 1925. ==Cast== *Paulo Benedetti *Carlo Campogalliani as Jorge Peirada *Amália de Oliveira *Polly de Viana *Bastos Estefânio *Augusto Gonçalves as Mena *Luiz Lizman *Lia Lupini *Letizia Quaranta *Alberto Sereno *Ivo Soares *Luiza Valle ==External links== * Category:1920s mystery drama films Category:1925 films Category:Brazilian black-and-white films Category:Brazilian films Category:Brazilian mystery films Category:Brazilian silent films Category:Films directed by Carlo Campogalliani Category:Brazilian drama films Category:1925 drama films
title: The Woman at Midnight
